name: Family
description: What are the different meanings of family? How do families change over time and place? What is the role of family within society?

name: The Past
description: How does the past influence how we live today? How does the present change what we think of the past?

name: Storytelling
description: Why do sories become connected to physical objects? Why do people tell them? How can artworks inspire new stories?

name: LGBTQ+
description: What can artworks tell us about the life of LGBTQ+ people? What are some of the LGBTQ+ perspectives on IMMA artworks?

name: Black and Irish
description: What does it mean to be Black and Irish? What are some of the Black and Irish perspectives on IMMA artworks?
